ovdesc.p: Internal balances file to hold customer-wise provision details. This holds a list of currency wise contracts and their total provision amounts.

desc.p: Indicates the amount that has been provisioned for the above deal.
Maximum of 15 Numeric characters.
Formatted to the currency mentioned in the corresponding Multi-value set.
Indicates currency-wise total Provision amount. This is the sum of all individual deal provision amounts for the currency.
Maximum of 15 Numeric characters.
Formatted to the currency mentioned in the corresponding Multi-value set.
Indicates the Asset classification of the deal mentioned in DEAL.REF.
Valid records in LN.ASSET.CLASS
Maximum of 3 Numeric characters.
Indicates the currency of the deal. The table stores the Provision amount for all contracts in this currency.
Multi-value field to hold multiple currencies.
Standard currency field.
Maximum of 3 characters.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CURRENCY file.
Indicates the customer for which Provision details are stored.
Valid CUSTOMER IDs.
Valid Customer Mnemonics are also accepted.
Indicates the deal ID for which Provision has been made. Presently accepts only LD, MG and PD contract IDs.
Valid contract IDs of LD, MG and PD.
Maximum of 12 Alpha numeric Characters.
